meanings.sent1: The geotactic behavior of the plant roots helps them grow downwards towards the soil.
meanings.sent2: The geotactic response of the seedlings causes them to bend towards the ground.
meanings.sent3: The geotactic dance of the falling leaf made it look like it was waltzing with gravity.
meanings.sent4: The geotactic pull of the mountain was irresistible, drawing climbers towards its peak.
meanings.sent5: The geotactic nature of the rock formations created a stunning landscape sculpted by gravity.

meanings.definition: Moving or orienting in response to gravity.
meanings.sent1: The geotactic insects crawled along the ground, following the pull of gravity.
meanings.sent2: Plants exhibit geotactic growth by reaching towards the earth to anchor themselves.
meanings.sent3: The geotactic cat always preferred to nap on the floor rather than on high surfaces.
meanings.sent4: The geotactic balloons slowly descended, guided by the force of gravity.
meanings.sent5: The geotactic behavior of the falling snowflakes created a mesmerizing display as they fluttered downwards.
